rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Senolytics 在对抗大脑衰老和 COVID-19 神经病理学方面显示出前景研究表明，senolytics 可以减少人脑类器官的衰老，并减轻 COVID-19 的神经病理学，这表明它们具有作为对抗大脑衰老和冠状病毒相关神经并发症的治疗策略的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Senolytics-show-promise-in-combating-brain-aging-and-COVID-19-neuropathology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Senolytics-show-promise-in-combating-brain-aging-and-COVID-19-neuropathology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=711b55ad-2fda-4391-9119-35c700b15b2a Wed, 15 Nov 2023 18:53:00 -0500 Senolytics show promise in combating brain aging and COVID-19 neuropathology
研究将生活方式选择和性别与工人脂肪肝疾病的严重程度联系起来研究调查了生活方式因素、性别、炎症、肝功能障碍和代谢异常与脂肪肝严重程度之间的相关性，结果表明男性面临更高的风险，生活方式的选择会显着影响疾病的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Study-links-lifestyle-choices-and-gender-to-severity-of-fatty-liver-disease-in-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Study-links-lifestyle-choices-and-gender-to-severity-of-fatty-liver-disease-in-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=410a8717-a44d-4bab-9b47-bc9dce895997 Wed, 15 Nov 2023 18:24:00 -0500 Study links lifestyle choices and gender to severity of fatty liver disease in workers
Stand Up To Cancer 推出新的胃食管癌研究团队和奖项Stand Up To Cancer (SU2C) 今天宣布成立三个研究团队，致力于将新疗法引入胃食管癌 (GEC) 的临床试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Stand-Up-To-Cancer-unveils-new-gastroesophageal-cancer-research-teams-and-awards.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Stand-Up-To-Cancer-unveils-new-gastroesophageal-cancer-research-teams-and-awards.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd223159-407b-4c0c-8772-32cc6e727774 Wed, 15 Nov 2023 14:43:14 -0500 Stand Up To Cancer unveils new gastroesophageal cancer research teams and awards
世界首个成人 1 型糖尿病风险筛查研究开始招募由布里斯托大学领导的世界首个研究项目将开始招募招募人员，该项目将识别患有 1 型糖尿病高风险的成年人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/World-first-type-1-diabetes-risk-screening-study-in-adults-opens-for-recruitment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/World-first-type-1-diabetes-risk-screening-study-in-adults-opens-for-recruitment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=605b174e-737f-4e21-83e1-576d956e3aa8 Wed, 15 Nov 2023 14:38:51 -0500 World-first type 1 diabetes risk screening study in adults opens for recruitment
研究揭示了限制癌基因驱动的皮肤癌形成的机制为了形成癌症，细胞需要积累致癌突变，从而赋予肿瘤启动特性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Study-reveals-mechanisms-restricting-oncogene-driven-skin-cancer-formation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Study-reveals-mechanisms-restricting-oncogene-driven-skin-cancer-formation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca1ad6d1-76a6-418a-96c4-5bfc1f1476cc Wed, 15 Nov 2023 14:33:42 -0500 Study reveals mechanisms restricting oncogene-driven skin cancer formation
新的诊断工作流程改进了 5q-脊髓性肌萎缩症的检测5q-脊髓性肌萎缩症 (5q-SMA) 是最常见的脊髓性肌萎缩症 (SMA) 类型之一，影响全球约万分之一的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/New-diagnostic-workflow-improves-detection-of-5q-spinal-muscular-atropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/New-diagnostic-workflow-improves-detection-of-5q-spinal-muscular-atropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae6f1af9-7469-45ec-a53f-f3718275c004 Wed, 15 Nov 2023 14:25:16 -0500 New diagnostic workflow improves detection of 5q-spinal muscular atrophy
CVD-21：预测和监测心血管疾病的新型仪器乌普萨拉大学的研究人员开发了一种仪器，可以通过简单的血液测试同时高精度地测量 21 种心血管疾病生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/CVD-21-A-novel-instrument-for-predicting-and-monitoring-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/CVD-21-A-novel-instrument-for-predicting-and-monitoring-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0339371a-e34c-4e79-bc20-c5e7a35d1778 Wed, 15 Nov 2023 14:19:53 -0500 CVD-21: A novel instrument for predicting and monitoring cardiovascular disease
最新监测数据显示抗生素耐药性感染和相关死亡人数上升今天在利兹举行的英国卫生安全局 (UKHSA) 年会上公布的最新国家监测数据显示，2022 年英国估计有 58,224 人出现抗生素耐药性感染，较 2021 年（55,792 人）增加了 4%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Latest-surveillance-data-shows-a-rise-in-antibiotic-pressive-infections-and-linked-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Latest-surveillance-data-shows-a-rise-in-antibiotic-pressive-infections-and-linked-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b6e0721-053b-41ee-8fbd-8f1f5538b05a Wed, 15 Nov 2023 14:10:37 -0500 Latest surveillance data shows a rise in antibiotic resistant infections and associated deaths
UVA 研究人员获得 NIH 资助，以优化农村居民的在线体重管理计划弗吉尼亚大学医学院的公共卫生研究人员与南卡罗来纳大学的同事一起，从美国国立卫生研究院获得了 337 万美元的资助，以确定是否可以通过添加人性化的接触。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/UVA-researchers-receive-NIH-grant-to-optimize-online-weight-management-programs-for-rural-residents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/UVA-researchers-receive-NIH-grant-to-optimize-online-weight-management-programs-for-rural-residents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e556be0-2dc1-42ad-bc6b-1bb0a94416d9 Wed, 15 Nov 2023 13:14:18 -0500 UVA researchers receive NIH grant to optimize online weight-management programs for rural residents
防止感染的免疫反应也会导致艾滋病毒潜伏期杜克大学健康中心的研究人员报告说，一种可能进化来帮助抵抗感染的免疫反应似乎是驱使人类免疫缺陷病毒（HIV）进入潜伏状态的机制，潜伏在细胞中只是为了重新爆发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Immune-response-that-protects-against-infections-also-drives-HIV-latency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Immune-response-that-protects-against-infections-also-drives-HIV-latency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9ba221c-902d-4cae-a79d-ef6579dc0690 Wed, 15 Nov 2023 13:09:52 -0500 Immune response that protects against infections also drives HIV latency
